name: UNITY (BLOOD TRIP SERIES #6 of 6)
description:
Before we return to the everyday world of men and machines, women and wildflowers, we hope to break through the veil. We might feel oneness with the universe. We might understand things that perplexed us in our normal lives. This is the space of revelation. This is the calm connection to everything. This is UNITY.

Sixth in a series of six. You can only receive this piece by collecting GOOD TRIP, the first in the series. You will also receive the other four images for free. Plus, one collector will be randomly selected to be gifted a 1/1 edition of the frozen blood macro photography shot that was the sole input for all the images in this series.

2238x3968 JPG

Minted July 24th, 2021. Verify via Twitter account @tormential and/or Instagram account @_tormential_ and/or tormential.tez
